content: decrease x3 3 single_crochet 15 row 17 2 single_crochet decrease x3 3 single_crochet 12 stuff legs and body with fiberfill row 18 decrease x6 6 fasten_off and leave tail long enough for backside hands make 2 use yellow yarn row 1 make 4 chain 4 row 2 on second chain from hook single_crochet 3 times 3 fasten_off and leave tail long enough to sew to the body white egg use white yarn row 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 row 2 increase x6 12 row 3 single_crochet increase x6 18 row 4 2 single_crochet increase x6 24 row 5 3 single_crochet increase x6 30 row 6 4 single_crochet increase x6 36 row 7-12 single_crochet in all st 36 row 13 single_crochet 2 double_crochet x12 36 fasten_off backside insert yarn tail into the body and pull the yarn between row 7-8 insert yarn into the body from the bottom to row 7-8 pull tight insert yarn at the same row and weave the tail assembly a sew hands to the body b create eyes and mouth with black yarn b b a hooknyarn id
